title: Verify: Optimize Backend and Frontend Performance
description:
Run automated tests for task T-035.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement backend async everywhere, connection pooling, lazy applet loading. On frontend, add code splitting, tree-shaking, and ReactFlow virtualization.
Criteria:
- Backend async and connection pooling enabled
- Lazy applet loading works
- Frontend code splitting and tree-shaking in place
- ReactFlow virtualization for large workflows
acceptance_criteria: Backend async and connection pooling enabled
Frontend code splitting and tree-shaking in place
